attributes.action: Hold a Public National Enquiry about the Grooming/Rape  gang  issue in the UK .
attributes.additional_details: Fully accept that local enquiries are not sufficient and we need  a full scale public National enquiry led by important balanced  experienced figures
attributes.background: Sanction an official National  Public enquiry

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
